channel.title: xmpp on Fossix
channel.description: Recent content in xmpp on Fossix

item.title: XMPP Auto Reply Bot
item.description: How about having a automatic reply for all your chats which are based on the XMPP? Even Gtalk is based on XMPP, and so many others too.

item.title: Find Invisible Gtalkers!
item.description: Find your buddies who decided to remain invisible
